players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Bob was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "Charlie is the mafia. Bob is dead, and I investigated Charlie last night. They are the mafioso."
You: "Diana, if you're the detective, why did you investigate Charlie instead of Bob? That seems risky."
Charlie: "Diana, if you're really the detective, why would you investigate me first night instead of someone more suspicious? That makes no sense."
Charlie: "Diana's claim is a desperate lie. If she were detective, she'd have investigated Bob, not me. She's trying to frame me to save herself."

Diana: "I investigated Charlie because my gut told me to, and my gut was right. Charlie is the mafia. Bob is dead, and Charlie is the one who killed him. We need to vote Charlie out to save ourselves."
You: "Diana, if you're the detective, why didn't you investigate Bob first night? That would have been the logical play to confirm a town member."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested

players.name: Bob

players.name: Charlie

You killed Bob.

Diana: "Charlie is the mafia. Bob is dead, and I investigated Charlie last night. They are the mafioso."
Alice: "Diana, if you're the detective, why did you investigate Charlie instead of Bob? That seems risky."
You: "Diana, if you're really the detective, why would you investigate me first night instead of someone more suspicious? That makes no sense."
You: "Diana's claim is a desperate lie. If she were detective, she'd have investigated Bob, not me. She's trying to frame me to save herself."

Diana: "I investigated Charlie because my gut told me to, and my gut was right. Charlie is the mafia. Bob is dead, and Charlie is the one who killed him. We need to vote Charlie out to save ourselves."
Alice: "Diana, if you're the detective, why didn't you investigate Bob first night? That would have been the logical play to confirm a town member."

players.name: Diana
memory: You're Diana, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Bob was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Charlie is the mafia. Bob is dead, and I investigated Charlie last night. They are the mafioso."
Alice: "Diana, if you're the detective, why did you investigate Charlie instead of Bob? That seems risky."
Charlie: "Diana, if you're really the detective, why would you investigate me first night instead of someone more suspicious? That makes no sense."
Charlie: "Diana's claim is a desperate lie. If she were detective, she'd have investigated Bob, not me. She's trying to frame me to save herself."
You: "I investigated Charlie because my gut told me to, and my gut was right. Charlie is the mafia. Bob is dead, and Charlie is the one who killed him. We need to vote Charlie out to save ourselves."
Alice: "Diana, if you're the detective, why didn't you investigate Bob first night? That would have been the logical play to confirm a town member."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested
